text: Erika Bertényi (born 18 March 1959) is a Hungarian rower. She competed in the women's quadruple sculls event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Hungary Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Vác
title: Erika Bertényi
